page.title: 07Church Services
page.content: The Parish Church of St. Lawrence There are 3 services on Sunday, one at 8am, one at 10am, and one at 6.30pm. Sometimes there is a baptism at 3.30pm on Sundays. There is also Holy Communion on Thursdays at 9.15am. On Sundays about 100 people attend the 10am service. There are 24 people at the 8am service and about 18 at the evening service. The church will hold 300-350 people and is used for concerts plays and meetings as well as for services. The Catholics hold their service on Friday evenings, in the parish church. There are 6 organisations belonging to the church. They are, a youth club a Sunday School, a church choir, a Mothers' Union, a young families group and a Bible Study group.
